infos.value: Don't hesitate!
Right. Our numbers assure our victory.
Let's settle this right now!
I shall not allow it.
I-incredible...
But I'd heard that you were just a coward who never once stepped foot on the battlefield...
Oh... S-sorry.
There is no need to apologize. What you've said is the truth.
But you're this strong...
It seems like you could drive off a whole platoon on your own, Lord Dario.
*Cough* *cough* *cough*
Lord Dario...!
Lord Dario... What happened earlier? You've been coughing something fierce since then...
That's right. You do not know.
I do not have much longer to live.
Huh...?
Tyrrell. So you've finally realized.
Even without our interference, the flame of Dario's life will soon be extinguished.
Look at him. He's completely exerting himself just to stand up.
Tyrrell. You're no fool. Think carefully.
After Dario is dead, what will become of Vinera?
Do you think she'll keep on living as a traitor without the man she loves?
If Lord Dario dies, I die, too!
No, I could not forgive that.
But thinking about a world without you in it...
Tyrrell... Do you not find Vinera pitiful?
But right now, there's still time.
Take Dario's life. If you do, the traitorous acts of you two will be overlooked.
Is that...really true?
You'll grant us forgiveness for what we've done?
Tyrrell!?
You mustn't! Take no heed of Doluza's words!
Tyrrell, try to imagine it. Returning to our homeland once more, the image of you and Vinera living happily...
Yes, you're right. In a temporary fit of passion, Vinera simply lost hold of her sanity.
So you have to come to your senses. You're the only one...who can do it.
Even if you do it...
Tyrrell... No matter what he says, they will not pardon you.
Vinera...
I will kill all those who dare to turn their swords toward Lord Dario...
You care for Lord Dario that much...?
*Cough* *cough* *cough*
...Now's our chance! Dario need no longer be feared!
There are still...this many...
It's okay, Vinera.
I'll protect Lord Dario!
Tyrrell...
Don't worry, Vinera. No matter what...I'll protect him no matter what!
